description: Genome Region from a reference genome assembly.
title: Genomic Region

___start_coordinate.description: The base position of the start coordinate of the region - start < end
___start_coordinate.title: Start

___end_location.description: If the exact end coordinate is not know a description of the start location
___end_location.title: Fuzzy End

___location_description.description: If exact coordinates of the region are not available a description of the genome location
___location_description.title: Location Description

___end_coordinate.description: The base position of the end coordinate - end > start
___end_coordinate.title: End

___genome_assembly.description: The genome assembly from which the region was derived
___genome_assembly.title: Genome Assembly

___start_location.description: If the exact start coordinate is not know a description of the start location
___start_location.title: Fuzzy Start

___chromosome.internal_comment: might need change for non human chromosome numbers like 2a 2b
___chromosome.title: Chromosome
